button.name: PhoenixHelp_TeleportLogin
button.tool_tip: Click here for help regarding the settings in this page.

check_box.label: Double-click Teleport
check_box.name: double_click_tp_toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Allows you to double click any surface, and your avatar will teleport to that position.

check_box.label: Double-click Autopilot
check_box.name: double_click_ap_toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Allows you to double click any surface, and your avatar will walk to that position.

check_box.label: Send teleport destination coordinates to channel
check_box.name: mldct_toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Whisper teleport destination on a private channel (Disabled by default)

spinner.name: mldct_channel
spinner.tool_tip: Used with movelocks, it whisper teleport destination on a private channel. Format it sends is: 128,128,128

check_box.label: Velocity Interpolate Double-click Teleports
check_box.name: login_screen_toggle1
check_box.tool_tip: Offsets your teleport destination by half your current speed. Eg. click in front of wall while running and end up behind it.

check_box.label: Rotate Camera behind avatar after Double-click Teleports
check_box.name: move_camaftertp_toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Rotates the camera behind the avatar after a teleport.

check_box.label: Always fly after teleports
check_box.name: flyaftertp_toggle
check_box.tool_tip: After teleporting, avatar is automatically set to hovering.

spinner.label: Double-click Teleport Z Offset
spinner.name: Double-click Teleport Z Offset
spinner.tool_tip: Controls the Z Offset for Double-click Teleports

check_box.label: Additionally offset up by half the avatar height
check_box.name: avcalc_toggle
check_box.tool_tip: The viewer will try to move the center of the avatar to the exact tp coordinate destination. This uses half the avatar height, thus putting your avatars feet on the tp destination instead.

check_box.label: Rotate avatar according to camera left/right rotation on doubleclick teleport
check_box.name: avrot_toggle
check_box.tool_tip: If your camera is facing south when you tp, your avatar will face south when you land.

check_box.label: Play Teleport sound effect
check_box.name: TPSound-toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Enables/disables the default tp sound effect.

check_box.label: Display Client Tags
check_box.name: DisplayTags_toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Shows you what client people are using beside their names. (If their client is identifiable)

check_box.label: Color Name Tags
check_box.name: ColorTags_toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Displays their tag in colors.

check_box.label: Make name Tags of the same client be the same color
check_box.name: ColorTagsClient_toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Displays their tag in colors depending on client they are using.

check_box.label: Color friend's name tags differently
check_box.name: ColorFriendsNameTags_toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Displays friend's tag in a different color (this overrides client tag colors on friends' name tags)

check_box.label: Disable Teleport Screens
check_box.name: tp_screen_toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Disables the black teleport screen during all teleports.

check_box.label: Disable Login Progress Screen
check_box.name: login_screen_toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Disables the black login progress Screen

check_box.label: Disable Logout Progress Screen
check_box.name: logout_screen_toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Disables the black Logout progress screen.

check_box.label: Enable progressive draw distance stepping
check_box.name: progressive_draw_distance
check_box.tool_tip: Enable progressive draw distance stepping.

slider.name: progressive_draw_distance_interval
slider.tool_tip: Interval in seconds between each draw distance increment

button.name: PhoenixHelp_Shields
button.tool_tip: Click here for help regarding the settings in this page.

radio_item.tool_tip: Will revoke permissions when you sit on an object.
Will revoke permissions when you stand from an object.
Will revoke permissions when you either stand or sit on an object.

check_box.label: Show your own color
check_box.name: PhShowOwnClientColor-toggle
check_box.tool_tip: When checked, your Tag will be shown in the given color.

check_box.label: Show Load URL dialogs
check_box.name: EmLoadURL-toggle
check_box.tool_tip: When unchecked, this prevents scripted objects from sending you dialogs using llLoadURL. This can be used to spam you.

check_box.label: Disallow LLMapDestination
check_box.name: EmBlockMapTps-toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Prevents scripts using llMapDestination from opening your map window. Also known as map spam.

check_box.label: Broadcast viewer effects
check_box.name: EmBroadcastEffects-toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Viewer effects are things like your avatar pointing at something when you edit it. Your eyes and head turning towards things you cam focus on, etc.

check_box.label: Broadcast camera focus point
check_box.name: EmBroadcastPointers-toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Prevents other users from seeing where your camera is and what it is focused on.

check_box.label: Broadcast pointer target
check_box.name: EmBroadcastPointers-toggle2
check_box.tool_tip: Similar to camera focus point, this prevents users from seeing what you are editing.

panel.label: IM
panel.name: Misc

button.name: PhoenixHelp_IM
button.tool_tip: Click here for help regarding the settings in this page.

radio_group.name: PhoenixUseOTR

radio_item.tool_tip: Require use of OTR in IMs

radio_group.radio_item: Require use of OTR in IMs

check_box.name: PhoenixOTRInTypingStop-toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Put all OTR encrypted messages into IM_TYPING_STOP packets. Incompatible with previous versions of OTR.
check_box.label: Use typing_stop for OTR
Vertical IM tabs (requires restart)
check_box.name: vertical-imtabs-toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Changes the UI to display IM tabs Vertically instead of horizontally

check_box.label: Announce incoming instant messages
check_box.name: PhoenixInstantMessageAnnounceIncoming
check_box.tool_tip: Opens an IM window when someone starts typing an IM to you, and says “You sense a disturbance in the force... (User Name is typing). This gives you a heads up that someone is IM’ing you before they hit enter.

check_box.label: Steal focus
check_box.name: PhoenixInstantMessageAnnounceStealFocus
check_box.tool_tip: Forces the IM window to steal focus over all other communication windows when someone starts typing an IM to you.

check_box.label: Enable Autoresponse
check_box.name: PhoenixInstantMessageResponseAnyone
check_box.tool_tip: Sends a pre made message of your choosing, when people start IM'ing you. (Enter your message in the Response Text. Text area), located below.

check_box.label: Autorespond to non-friends
check_box.name: PhoenixInstantMessageResponseFriends
check_box.tool_tip: Sends a pre made message of your choosing, when people start IM’ing you. (Enter your message in the Response Text. Text area), located below.

check_box.label: Autorespond to people you have muted
check_box.name: PhoenixInstantMessageResponseMuted
check_box.tool_tip: Sends a pre made message of your choosing, when people start IM’ing you. (Enter your message in the Response Text. Text area), located below.

check_box.label: Send as soon as they start typing
check_box.name: PhoenixInstantMessageShowOnTyping

check_box.label: Don't show IMs you auto-responsed to
check_box.name: PhoenixInstantMessageShowResponded

panel.text: Response Text: (Use #f for recipient's first name, #l for last name, #t for timestamp, #r for SLURL of your location, #i for your idle time. (e.g. "5 mins")):

check_box.label: Send an item along with the response
check_box.name: PhoenixInstantMessageResponseItem
check_box.tool_tip: You can include an inventory item to send along with your auto response by dragging it from your inventory to the location below

text.name: Give inventory
text.tool_tip: Drop an inventory item here to have it given along with the auto-response.

button.name: PhoenixHelp_Chat
button.tool_tip: Click here for help regarding the settings in this page.

check_box.label: Display Total Script Count changes:
check_box.name: totalscriptjumps
check_box.tool_tip: Displays script count changes in your region, dependant on the threshold you choose to the right.

spinner.name: ScriptJumpCount
spinner.tool_tip: Threshold for the script jump message [Default: 100]

check_box.label: Hear typing sound when people type
check_box.name: typing-sound-toggle

check_box.label: Auto complete OOC comments.
check_box.name: AutoCloseOOC-toggle
check_box.tool_tip: For use with Role playing. Auto completes “Out of Character Comments.” Example. ((This is OOC. - results in ((This is OOC)). The closing brackets are generated automatically.

check_box.label: Allow MU* poses
check_box.name: AllowMUpose-toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Allow MU* pose style in chat and IM (with ':' as a synonymous to '/me ')

check_box.label: Show money changes in local chat
check_box.name: EmMoneyChat-toggle

check_box.label: Add seconds to the timestamps in logs
check_box.name: PhoenixAddSecondsInLog-toggle

check_box.label: Add seconds to the timestamps in chat history
check_box.name: PhoenixAddSecondsInHistory-toggle

check_box.label: When 'Receive group notices' is disabled, disable group chat aswell
check_box.name: PhoenixMuteGroupWhenNoticesDisabled-toggle

check_box.label: Notify me when a group chat is muted
check_box.name: PhoenixNotifyWhenMutingGroupChat-toggle

check_box.label: Right click translate also replaces selected text
check_box.name: PhoenixTranslateReplace

check_box.label: Use 'You' instead of your name in your own chat
check_box.name: PhoenixUseYou

check_box.label: Make moderators' chat text bold in group chats
check_box.name: PhoenixBoldGroupMods

check_box.label: Show group name next to IM when printed in chat history
check_box.name: DiamondShowGroupNameInChatIM

check_box.label: Auto-complete names in local chat when pressing Tab. key
check_box.name: TabAutoComplete

button.name: keyword_allert
button.label: Edit Key Word Alerts
button.tool_tip: Edit what messages stand out

button.name: ac_button
button.label: Edit Autocorrect Settings
button.tool_tip: Edit settings to autocorrect words

button.name: PhoenixHelp_Misc
button.tool_tip: Click here for help regarding the settings in this page.

check_box.label: Enable Ctrl-Alt-P to become visually phantom
check_box.name: allowphantomtoggle

check_box.label: Enable Ctrl-Alt-S to ground sit anywhere
check_box.name: allowsittoggle

check_box.label: Block sitting on objects via left-click
check_box.name: sit-click-toggle

check_box.label: Show agent name for LookAt beacons
check_box.name: EmShowLookAtNames-toggle

check_box.label: Don't show me my LookAt beacon
check_box.name: EmDontShowMyLook-toggle

check_box.label: ESC key to reset camera position
check_box.name: EmResetCamOnEscape-toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Setting this value to False prevents the camera from resetting when escape is pressed from within Camera mode (Ctrl+1).

check_box.label: Clicking on avatar resets camera position
check_box.name: ResetCamOnAvatar-toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Setting this value to False prevents the camera from resetting when clicking on your avatar.

check_box.label: Always rez objects under the land group if possible
check_box.name: grouplandrez

check_box.label: Allows the camera to move without constraints through prims (requires restart)
check_box.name: EmIgnoreCamConstraints-toggle

check_box.label: Show stream information in chat
check_box.name: PhoenixShowStreamMetadata
check_box.tool_tip: Displays the name and artist of the song currently playing on the stream in chat.

check_box.label: Show a message when someone takes a snapshot
check_box.name: PhoenixAlertOnSnapshot
check_box.tool_tip: Shows who took a snapshot in local chat

check_box.label: Mute Gestures
check_box.name: PhoenixMuteGestures
check_box.tool_tip: Mute Gestures

check_box.label: Enable Restrained Love [RLVa] features (Requires a restart)
check_box.name: rlv-toggle

panel.label: CmdLine
panel.name: CmdLine

button.name: PhoenixHelp_CmdLine
button.tool_tip: Click here for help regarding the settings in this page.

check_box.label: Enable usage of chat bar as a command line
check_box.name: chat_cmd_toggle

panel.text: Teleport within sim (usage: cmd x y z)

slider.name: PhoenixCmdLinePlatformSize
slider.label: Width
slider.tool_tip: How big do you want the platform to appear to be?

panel.text: Teleport to sim x (usage: cmd simname)
Get avatar name from key (usage: cmd key)
Offer teleport to avatar (usage: cmd key)

line_editor.tool_tip: The syntax of this command allows partial names and is not case sensitive. Better results if used while the Radar is open.
line_editor.name: PhoenixCmdLineTP2

line_editor.tool_tip: Clears the Chat History to prevent lag effects from chat spammers.
line_editor.name: PhoenixCmdLineClearChat

panel.text: Set the media url (usage: cmd url type)

line_editor.tool_tip: Sets and plays your media stream to the entered url
line_editor.name: PhoenixCmdLineMedia

panel.text: Set the music stream url (usage: cmd url)

line_editor.tool_tip: sets and plays your music stream to the entered url
line_editor.name: PhoenixCmdLineMusic

button.name: PhoenixHelp_Avatar
button.tool_tip: Click here for help regarding the settings in this page.

spinner.label: X Modifier
spinner.name: X Modifier
spinner.tool_tip: Use this to manipulate, to a degree, your avatar bounding box. This can be used to distort orbiters, or to raise you up or down without altering your shape.

spinner.label: Y Modifier
spinner.name: Y Modifier
spinner.tool_tip: Use this to manipulate, to a degree, your avatar bounding box. This can be used to distort orbiters, or to raise you up or down without altering your shape.

spinner.label: Z Modifier
spinner.name: Z Modifier
spinner.tool_tip: Use this to manipulate, to a degree, your avatar bounding box. This can be used to distort orbiters, or to raise you up or down without altering your shape.

check_box.label: Show appearance tag and animation in appearance mode
check_box.name: PhoenixAppearanceAnimate

check_box.label: Unsit avatar when entering appearance mode
check_box.name: PhoenixAppearanceForceStand

check_box.label: Use crouch key in toggle mode
check_box.name: PhoenixCrouchToggle
check_box.tool_tip: If selected, a single press of the crouch key will toggle the state between crouching and normal, instead of hold to crouch.

slider.name: PhoenixMaxBeamsPerSecond
slider.label: Beam updates/sec:
slider.tool_tip: How many beam updates to send in a second. Default 40

combo_box.name: BeamColor_combo
combo_box.tool_tip: Select the color preset for the selection beam

combo_box.name: PhoenixBeamShape_combo
combo_box.tool_tip: Select the shape for the particle beam

slider.name: PhoenixBeamShapeScale
slider.label: Scale:
slider.tool_tip: Change the scale of the shape used for the Phoenix Shaped Beam

button.name: delete_beam
button.label: Delete
button.tool_tip: Remove this beam

button.name: custom_beam_btn
button.label: Create New
button.tool_tip: Customize the beam shape

button.name: refresh_beams
button.label: Refresh List
button.tool_tip: Refresh the beam list

button.name: BeamColor_delete
button.label: Delete
button.tool_tip: Remove this preset

button.name: BeamColor_new
button.label: Create New
button.tool_tip: Create a new color preset

button.name: BeamColor_refresh
button.label: Refresh List
button.tool_tip: Refresh the preset list

panel.label: Build
panel.name: Build

button.name: PhoenixHelp_Build
button.tool_tip: Click here for help regarding the settings in this page.

combo_box.name: combobox shininess
combo_box.tool_tip: Set the amount of shine for the object

check_box.name: PhoenixBuildPrefsEmbedItem
check_box.label: Embed an item into the newly created object

panel.text: Drop an inventory item here to have it added to the prim contents.

check_box.label: Values are percent
check_box.tool_tip: Default settings are Percentages and every axis set at 50
check_box.name: EmPivotPercToggle

check_box.label: Show axis arrow on root prim position
check_box.tool_tip: Default behaviour is to show the axis on the center of mass of a linkset. If enabled, the axis will be shown on the root prim of the linkset instead.
check_box.name: EmBuildPrefsActualRoot_toggle

panel.label: IRC
panel.name: IRC

button.name: PhoenixHelp_IRC
button.tool_tip: Click here for help regarding the settings in this page.

panel.text: Colors used to display IRC Messages:

check_box.tool_tip: Show this messages in the window?
check_box.name: PhIRC_ShowChannel

check_box.tool_tip: Show this messages in the window?
check_box.name: PhIRC_ShowAction

check_box.tool_tip: Show this messages in the window?
check_box.name: PhIRC_ShowPrivate

check_box.tool_tip: Show this messages in the window?
check_box.name: PhIRC_ShowNotice

check_box.tool_tip: Show this messages in the window?
check_box.name: PhIRC_ShowJoin

check_box.tool_tip: Show this messages in the window?
check_box.name: PhIRC_ShowQuit

check_box.tool_tip: Show this messages in the window?
check_box.name: PhIRC_ShowKick

check_box.tool_tip: Show this messages in the window?
check_box.name: PhIRC_ShowNick

check_box.tool_tip: Show this messages in the window?
check_box.name: PhIRC_ShowSystem

check_box.label: Auto Re-Join
check_box.tool_tip: Automaticly accempt to reconnect to the channel you were just in if kicked. Some networks dont like this and may ban you for doing so, be carefull.
check_box.name: PhoenixIRC_AutoReJoin

check_box.label: Auto Connect at login
check_box.tool_tip: Automaticly connect to any IRC networks that you have set to auto connect to upon startup.
check_box.name: PhoenixIRC_AutoConnect

button.name: PhoenixHelp_Inventory
button.tool_tip: Click here for help regarding the settings in this page.

check_box.label: Wear objects in inventory via double-click
check_box.name: wear-inv-toggle

check_box.label: Don't select new objects in my inventory

button.name: PhoenixHelp_Effects
button.tool_tip: Click here for help regarding the settings in this page.

check_box.label: Enable enhanced physics on avatar breasts
check_box.name: EmBreastsToggle

button.label: Default Settings
button.name: PhoenixBreastReset
button.tool_tip: Revert the values to the default settings.

check_box.label: Full Gamma / Hardcoded 2
check_box.name: FullGamma
check_box.tool_tip: Sets which Full Bright you want to use / (On - Uses Full Gamma) (Off - Uses Hardcoded 2 Value)

check_box.label: Render Glow Effects
check_box.name: RenderGlow
check_box.tool_tip: Dont deactivate this with active Deferred Renderer!

check_box.label: Render Light Radius
check_box.name: LightRadius
check_box.tool_tip: Renders the Light Radius as a Ball

check_box.label: Turn off Render > Types > Clouds by default at login
check_box.name: PhoenixKillTheClouds

panel.label: SpellCheck
panel.name: SpellCheck

button.name: PhoenixHelp_SpellCheck
button.tool_tip: Click here for help regarding the settings in this page.

panel.text: To spellcheck, right click a misspelled word (red or not) and click on its replacement
